title: Spain Foreign Direct Investment
description: Foreign Direct Investment in Spain increased by 5752 EUR Million in August of 2022. Foreign Direct Investment in Spain averaged 2165.47 EUR Million from 1993 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 22976 EUR Million in October of 2007 and a record low of -10696 EUR Million in December of 2014. This page provides - Spain Foreign Direct Investment - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Spain
